description: Comprehensive site audit using Playwright to review all pages, check for errors, validate brand alignment, and prepare strategic funder documentation

features.title: Audit Core Public Pages
features.description: Use Playwright to screenshot and audit core public pages: Home (/), About (/about), How It Works (/how-it-works), Contact (/contact), Privacy (/privacy), Terms (/terms). Check for: broken layouts, missing content, console errors, brand alignment. Save screenshots to /tmp/audit/ and create audit report.

features.title: Audit Stories Section
features.description: Use Playwright to audit Stories pages: /stories, /stories/the-pattern, /stories/intelligence, /stories/new. Check story cards render, navigation works, empathy ledger integration. Document any issues.

features.title: Audit Intelligence Hub
features.description: Use Playwright to audit Intelligence pages: /intelligence, /intelligence/evidence, /intelligence/interventions, /intelligence/portfolio, /intelligence/nt-showcase. Check ALMA stats display, filters work, detail pages load. This is a key funder showcase section.

features.title: Audit Network & Services
features.description: Use Playwright to audit Network and Services: /network, /services, /organizations, /people, /community-programs, /community-map. Check maps render, listings work, detail pages load, filters function.

features.title: Audit Centre of Excellence
features.description: Use Playwright to audit Centre of Excellence: /centre-of-excellence, /centre-of-excellence/research, /centre-of-excellence/best-practice, /centre-of-excellence/people, /centre-of-excellence/global-insights, /centre-of-excellence/map. Key research showcase for funders.

features.title: Audit Events & Stewards
features.description: Use Playwright to audit Events and Stewards: /events, /stewards, /stewards/impact, /signup. Check event listings, registration flow, steward tiers, signup wizard.

features.title: Audit Youth Justice Report Section
features.description: Use Playwright to audit Youth Justice Report: /youth-justice-report, /youth-justice-report/inquiries, /youth-justice-report/recommendations, /youth-justice-report/research, /youth-justice-report/interventions, /youth-justice-report/international, /youth-justice-report/chat. Critical evidence section for funders.

features.title: Audit Special Feature Pages
features.description: Use Playwright to audit special pages: /contained (documentary), /art-innovation, /youth-scout, /talent-scout, /flywheel, /roadmap, /grassroots, /transparency, /visuals/*. These showcase unique JusticeHub capabilities.

features.title: Audit Wiki & Content Strategy
features.description: Use Playwright to audit Wiki: /wiki. Review wiki structure, content completeness, navigation. Document gaps and opportunities for strategic content that funders would value.

features.title: Audit Blog & Gallery
features.description: Use Playwright to audit Blog and Gallery: /blog, /gallery. Check content displays, images load, SEO meta tags present.

features.title: Brand Alignment Review
features.description: Review all audit reports and screenshots. Compare against JusticeHub brand guidelines: brutalist design, black/white/accent colors, sharp edges, bold typography, ACT values alignment. Create comprehensive brand alignment report.

features.title: Create Error Fix Guide
features.description: Compile all errors, broken links, console errors, and issues found during audits. Create prioritized fix guide with specific file locations and recommended fixes.

features.title: Create Funder Strategic Plan
features.description: Synthesize all audits into a comprehensive strategic plan document suitable for funders. Include: platform overview, key capabilities, impact metrics shown on site, evidence base, growth opportunities, technical health assessment, and recommended investments.
